CLUSTER_VIEW_DESC: View cluster, node, region info in platform
CLUSTER_EDIT_DESC: Edit cluster, node, region info in platform
CLUSTER_MANAGER: Cluster administrator, with all cluster management permissions
IAM_MANAGER: User administrator, with all user management permissions
PLATFORM_ADMIN: Platform administrator, with the authority to set platform, cluster management, user management, audit, etc.
PLATFORM_VIEW: Platform read-only user, with all platform viewing permissions
